item.title:
RT by @elonmusk: üö® JUST IN: President Trump praises Elon Musk for NEVER asking for favors regarding the EV mandate
Trump credited Elon for saying "as long as I'm on the same plain as everybody else, we'll do good and make a better product."
"That was very cool," Trump said.

üö® JUST IN: President Trump praises Elon Musk for NEVER asking for favors regarding the EV mandate

Trump credited Elon for saying "as long as I'm on the same plain as everybody else, we'll do good and make a better product."

"That was very cool," Trump said.

item.title:
There are potentially serious concerns about the long-term safety of the @Space_Station. Some parts of it are simply getting too old and obviously that risk grows over time.
Even though @SpaceX earns billions of dollars from transporting astronauts & cargo to the ISS, I nonetheless would like to go on record recommending that it be de-orbited within 2 years.
item.dc:creator: @elonmusk
item.description:
There are potentially serious concerns about the long-term safety of the @Space_Station. Some parts of it are simply getting too old and obviously that risk grows over time.

Even though @SpaceX earns billions of dollars from transporting astronauts & cargo to the ISS, I nonetheless would like to go on record recommending that it be de-orbited within 2 years.

item.dc:creator: @DOGE
item.description:
Unused Software License Update!

@USDA saved $14M/yr by removing 6,323 unused PowerApps (20,708 to 14,385), 2,549 Team Domestic Calling licenses (8,412 to 5,863), 822 Project Planners (2,116 to 1,294) and 2,335 Visio licenses (4,987 to 2,652).

@NASA saved ~$500k/yr by removing 2,500 unused Office licenses (60,000 to 57,500).

127.0.0.1:8049/DOGE/status/1894076196242985188#m
